r.s: Additional ZF tools specifically for use during Magento development.
r.d: Additional ZF tools specifically for use during Magento development. Adding commands that will be useful during development with Magento. Command include: Clear cache, enable / disable cache and create admin user.
r.n: Added new config lint functionality Updated other commands to provide more feedback Fixed a bug with exception handling for extension generation Integrated downstream commits for the extension skeleton files
